sentences.en: At times he seems rather ordinary. At other times ethereal, perhaps even spectral.
sentences.cn: 有时好像很普通,有时又虚无缥缈, 甚至像个幽灵.

sentences.en: Intoxicating earth aromas induced lassitude and ethereal calm.
sentences.cn: 泥土的醉人的芳香叫人懒洋洋的,感到一种远离尘世的宁静.

sentences.en: Matter was supposed to contain, besides its material constituents, an ethereal fluid.
sentences.cn: 物质, 除了它的实质性的成分外, 被想象为含有某种微妙的流质.

sentences.en: Once unified by the Ethereal Caste the Tau made incredible technological progress.
sentences.cn: 自从统一在以太阶层的领导下以来,Tau取得了难以置信的技术进步.

sentences.en: She had an ethereal and plain style, same as her poems.
sentences.cn: 绿音有一种淡淡的不求装饰的风格, 她的诗也一样.

sentences.en: She is a beautiful woman of ethereal color and celestial fragrance.
sentences.cn: 她容颜秀丽、举止端庄,真可谓是天香国色呀.

sentences.en: She's the prettiest, most ethereal romantic heroine in the movies.
sentences.cn: 她是所有电影中最美丽、最飘逸的爱情女主角。

sentences.en: Stargazers : They were wise councilors, if a bit too ethereal.
sentences.cn: Stargazers:他们是明智的议员, 即使他们的想法有一点空洞.

sentences.en: The most insignificient transgression reverberated in the most ethereal worlds.
sentences.cn: 最微不足道的罪行在最超越尘俗的天地里引起回响.

sentences.en: The music has an ethereal quality.
sentences.cn: 这段乐曲给人一种飘渺的感觉.

sentences.en: The sun's rays gave the room an ethereal glow.
sentences.cn: 柔和的阳光照亮了这间屋子.

sentences.en: Wear a fabulousboho frock – the more ethereal youlook, the better.
sentences.cn: 穿一件让人惊叹的波希米亚式连衣裙——看上去越轻盈越好.

sentences.en: With its plug - and - compute simplicity, the cloud seems ethereal, but don't be fooled.
sentences.cn: 尽管云计算这种“即插即算”的简单服务看起来虚无缥缈, 但不要被它愚弄.

sentences.en: You can't see ideas especially such highly ethereal ones as mine.
sentences.cn: 概念这玩意儿是看不见摸不着的,何况我这个概念更加虚无飘渺.

trans.tran_cn: 天上的，轻飘的，[化]乙醚的
trans.tran_en: very delicate and light, in a way that does not seem real
